item.title: Brett Eagleson to Newsmax: Silence From WH 'Deafening' on 9/11 Families' Saudi Lawsuit
item.description: 9/11 Justice President Brett Eagleson, who lost his father in the terror attacks 24 years ago, told Newsmax Thursday that the 9/11 families' effort to...

item.title: Sen. Ernst to Newsmax: Kirk 'Will Be a Voice Yet in the Future'
item.description: Turning Point USA founder and CEO Charlie Kirk was assassinated at an event at Utah Valley University in Orem, Utah, Wednesday afternoon.

item.title: Trump: Awarding Kirk Posthumous Medal of Freedom
item.description: At his 9/11 memorial speech, President Donald Trump announced the late Charlie Kirk will be awarded the prestigious Presidential Medal of Freedom.

item.title: James Comer to Newsmax: Charlie Kirk's Death Adds Sadness to 9/11 Anniversary
item.description: The assassination of Charlie Kirk added extreme sadness to the already solemn 24th anniversary of the 9/11 terrorist attacks, House Oversight Committe...

item.title: VP Vance Cancels 9/11 Memorial Appearance to Visit Family of Charlie Kirk
